entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 6:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -8.3°C
Wind: SSE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow or rain changing to rain and ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
